GSD.product_version: versions from v3.9 to before v5.4.211
GSD.description:
vsock: Fix memory leak in vsock_connect()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit f82f1e2042b397277cd39f16349950f5abade58d, it was introduced in version v3.9 by commit d021c344051af91f42c5ba9fdedc176740cbd238. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: vsock: Fix memory leak in vsock_connect()
